name: UCCollateOptions
desc: Specifies options for Unicode string comparison.

items.name: var kUCCollateCaseInsensitiveMask: Int
items.desc: If the corresponding bit is set, then uppercase and titlecase characters are treated as equivalent to the corresponding lowercase characters.

items.name: var kUCCollateDiacritInsensitiveMask: Int
items.desc: If the corresponding bit is set, then characters with diacritics are treated as equivalent to the corresponding characters without diacritics.
